course_description: Systems of linear equations, matrices, determinants, linear transformations, eigenvalues and eigenvectors, least-squares.
prerequisites: MATH 111 or MATH_OX 111 or MATH 112 or MATH_OX 112 or MATH 112Z or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
